official_title: A bill to modify the Jackson Hole Snake River local protection flood control project in Wyoming to authorize maintenance work to be performed by the Corps of Engineers.

summary.text: Modifies the Jackson Hole, Snake River local protection flood control project in Wyoming to authorize maintenance work to be performed by the Corps of Engineers. Provides that non-Federal interests shall pay a certain amount of any cost expended in any one year.

titles.title: A bill to modify the Jackson Hole Snake River local protection flood control project in Wyoming to authorize maintenance work to be performed by the Corps of Engineers.
